EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne Tour_PARENT_2018.LA Reminder July 6 send
EmailTemplate.subject: See you Tuesday at SpringOne Tour!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We look forward to seeing you Tuesday at SpringOne Tour LA <[[http://springonetour.io/2018/los-angeles?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-springonetour-la-q218]]>. Please review the event details below and feel free to email the team at springonetour@pivotal.io <[[mailto:springonetour@pivotal.io]]> with any questions. Please be sure to bring your government-issued ID, like a driver's license, with you when you check in.

Location Convene <[[https://convene.com/location/777-south-figueroa-street/]]> 777 South Figueroa Street <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Convene/@34.0484454,-118.2613875,15z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x0:0x310ddeea60e9ca6c?sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjXhMeF99XZAhVO9WMKHXx_Ci8Q_BIIggEwCg]]> Los Angeles, CA 90017 <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Convene/@34.0484454,-118.2613875,15z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x0:0x310ddeea60e9ca6c?sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjXhMeF99XZAhVO9WMKHXx_Ci8Q_BIIggEwCg]]>
Parking Info:
- There is an onsite parking garage dedicated to the building.
We look forward to seeing you on Tuesday! Tasha Isenberg and the SpringOne Tour Team
